short_summary: Electronic circuit design and circuit breaker for Canadian military fleet.
full_summary:
### Circuit Breaker Tender Notice
#### Solicitation Number: W8482-252715/A

**Notice Type**
This is a [Request for Proposal](#request_for_proposal).

**Contract Details**

* **Title**: Circuit Breaker
* **GSIN Code**: 81101702 (Electronic circuit design)
* **Unspsc Description**: Electronic circuit design
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Contract Start Date**: June 17, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: November 26, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada and British Columbia

**Summary**
The Department of National Defense is soliciting a bid for a Circuit Breaker, Model ETN2752-00S01, L3HARRIS MARITIME POWER & ENERGY SOLUTIONS, INC. The item requires two (2) units, and deliverables will be made to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Submission Requirements**

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars only.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers for final procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in English or French.
* Suppliers proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate brand name and model, and/or Part Number and National Stock Number (NSN).

**Eligibility**
This tender is open to all suppliers meeting the solicitation's requirements.

**Colloquium Information**

* Ministry of National Defense
* 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* Katharine Barker
* Email: <katharine.barker2@forces.gc.ca>
* Phone: (555) 555-5555

**Attachments**

* Tender Notice: [Attachment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39225/rfp-w8482-252715-eng.pdf)
* Tender Notice (French): [Attachment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39225/rep-w8482-252715-fre.pdf)

**Tender Closing Date**
June 14, 2024 at 14:00:00

Note: Any typographical errors are the original text shared by the contractor.
